alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Harrison, northeastern Hancock and southeastern Pearl River Counties through 830 AM CDT... At 800 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mcneil, or 10 miles northeast of Picayune, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mcneil and Saucier. This includes Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 10 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for southern Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Pearl River
